synonyms: gopīnātha-paṭṭanāyaka—Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka; sevaka tomāra—your servant; sevakera prāṇa-daṇḍa—to condemn a servant to death; nahe—is not; vyavahāra—good behavior.
translation: "After all," he said, "Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka is your faithful servant. To condemn a servant to death is not good behavior.
